## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                          | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `collapsed` | `collapsed` | Expands / collapses the card content | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                         | Type               |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `pdCollapsed` | Emitted when the value has changed. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
